about_the_game: Experience the third chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Directly following the horrific discoveries in the underground laboratory, you'll face an all new story chapter as Lydia continues to fight for survival. Includes additional content for the Battle Mode.
detailed_description: Experience the third chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Directly following the horrific discoveries in the underground laboratory, you'll face an all new story chapter as Lydia continues to fight for survival. Includes additional content for the Battle Mode.
legal_notice: Outbreak & Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles © 2016-2018 Dead Drop Studios LLC. All Rights Reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
